content:
[PLAN]
1. Greet the user and confirm readiness to assist
2. Offer help with their development tasks
[/PLAN]

[THOUGHT]
The user has initiated a new session. I should greet them and let them know I'm ready to help with their coding tasks. I'll keep the response friendly and professional.
[/THOUGHT]

Hello! I'm Sarvam-OS, your AI coding assistant. How can I help you today? Whether it's writing code, debugging, or managing your project, I'm here to assist.
